Title: Performance & Load Validation

Owner: Kilo

Description:
Conduct stress and performance testing, define SLOs, and tune autoscaling.

Tasks:
- Run stress tests (1k concurrent)
- Define latency & throughput SLOs
- Tune HPA/autoscaling policies
- Produce benchmark report

Acceptance Criteria:
- SLOs defined and validated
- Autoscaling triggers correctly under load

Labels: perf, load, priority:high
